title: France releases suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' tanker after fine paid
summary_full: French Foreign Minister Jean-Noël Barrot said the vessel was departing Marseille after a payment of "several million euros".
summary_public: French Foreign Minister Jean-Noël Barrot said the vessel was departing Marseille after a payment of "several million euros".
